result.reason: Port scanner is outside mRemoteNG's core scope as a connection manager; dedicated tools like nmap/Advanced IP Scanner already serve this purpose, and an empty feature request with no details or community demand doesn't justify the significant implementation and maintenance cost.
result.approach: No implementation — feature is out of scope. Users should use dedicated network scanning tools alongside mRemoteNG.
